page.title: 03LOCAL TRADITIONS 1
page.content:
THE ISLAND RUN The Island run is a ten-mile run from Shellness to Sheerness.Lots of people enter it.Some people run as relay teams while others run the whole distance.Many run in fancy dress.The winner gets a special trophy.The first islander home,the first male,the first female,the first team,the first schoolboy and the first schoolgirl also get special trophies and everyone who finishes gets a plain trophy. Most people get a sheet of sponsors and the schoolchildren's money goes to the Sheppey Comprehensive School's sports fund.
Caroline Packer.
